page.title: 05INDUSTRY 2
page.content: In Law we have a car repainting service owned by Ian Skelly.8 people are employed and they work from 8.30a.m.to 5p.m.There are no female workers employed.The workers come from local areas.The painting materials are purchased from Brown Brothers in Motherwell,who deliver them by van. There is also a man in Law who does car body work.He works on his own.The company is called P.J. Autos.He also buys his painting materials from Brown Brothers in Motherwell. Domestic appliances are fixed in Law. The company is J.Bach Domestics.They repair kettles,irons,toasters,hoovers, washing machines,tumble driers etc. They work 6 days a week from 9a.m.to 5p.m.They employ 15 people.They own 2 shops and fix appliances from as far away as Helensburgh,Dumbarton and Dunfermline.
